original_text:
How long will you lie there, O sluggard?
    When will you arise from your sleep?
korean_text: 게으른 자여 네가 어느 때까지 누워 있겠느냐 네가 어느 때에 잠이 깨어 일어나겠느냐

sentences.original_text: How long will you lie there, O sluggard?
sentences.korean_translation: 게으른 자여, 너는 언제까지 누워 있겠느냐?

sentences.original_text: When will you arise from your sleep?
